data.question: What is the empirical formula of Y-shp-MOF-5 as synthesized?
What crystal system and space group does Y-shp-MOF-5 belong to?
At what temperature were the single-crystal X-ray diffraction data for the as synthesized structure of Y-shp-MOF-5 measured?
What is the maximum theta range for data collection of Y-shp-MOF-5 at 0% RH?
Is the Y-shp-MOF-5 structure hydrolytically stable?
Does the Y-shp-MOF-5 structure retain its crystallinity up to 300 °C?
Can Y-shp-MOF-5 adsorb and desorb water vapor?
What is the working range for moisture level control proposed by ASHRAE for Y-shp-MOF-5?
What is the working capacity of Y-shp-MOF-5 under non-equilibrium adsorption and desorption cycles driven by the repetitive change in relative humidity between 45% RH and 65% RH?
What is the water uptake of Y-shp-MOF-5 at 30% RH and 75% RH?
data.answer: 7 wt% at 30% RH and 50 wt% at 75% RH

data.question: Does the Y-shp-MOF-5 structure exhibit a (4, 12)-c shp topology?
Is the nonanuclear (Y9) cluster in Y-shp-MOF-5 disordered over two positions?
What is the formula weight of Y-shp-MOF-5 when exposed to 100% RH?
What is the volume of the unit cell for Y-shp-MOF-5 at 22% RH?
What is the final R index for Y-shp-MOF-5 at 0% RH for data observed with I > 2σ(I)?
Does the Y-shp-MOF-5 structure maintain its phase purity after 1000 water sorption cycles?
Was the SQUEEZE procedure used to estimate crystal composition for the structures of Y-shp-MOF-5?
What is the working range for moisture level control slightly reduced upon increasing the temperature for Y-shp-MOF-5?
data.answer: Yes, the working range is slightly reduced upon increasing the temperature

data.question: What is the BET surface area of Y-shp-MOF-5?
data.answer: The BET surface area is determined from argon adsorption isotherms collected at 87 K

data.question: Is the Y-shp-MOF-5 structure composed of a 12-c nonanuclear cluster linked via 12 carboxylates from 12 different BTEB ligands?
